subject: S1 steering wheel
description_text:
I was interested in your S1 wheel and button box. But I have a couple of questions. What is the diameter of the wheel? Does this use the standard 6x70mm bolt pattern so that I can attach it to my existing VRS quick release?

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Tim Coates, Our steering wheel is 13 inches, and the quick release uses a 6×70 mm bolt pattern—that’s correct.

Thank you for the quick response.

Sent from my iPhone
